page.title: 01IVER HEATH INFORMATION
page.content:
The main points of Iver Heath are the Church,the water splash,the M25,the 2 schools and Pinewood Studios where Superman and James Bond were filmed.The reverend of our church is Mr. Peel who lives in Pinewood Road.The Crooked Billet is by a big round-about near Wood Lane. Some recent work has been applied to the steak-house.A river runs through a road near Fulmer which is called a ford.Pinewood Studios is probably one of the most famous studios in Europe it has filmed Superman,Star Wars,Who Dares wins and 007.Due to a massive fire a big James Bond set has been ruined and has had to be re-built.
by:CHRIS EDWARDS, age:11
